input.description: S3 URI to samplesheet.csv. Rows therein point to S3 URIs for fastq data

igenomes_base.description: URI base for iGenomes references. (e.g. s3://ngi-igenomes/igenomes/)

genome.description: Name of iGenomes reference. - e.g. GATK.GRCh38

tools.description: Tools to use for variant calling and/or for annotation.

split_fastq.description: Specify how many reads each split of a FastQ file contains. Set 0 to turn off splitting at all.

intervals.description: Path to target bed file in case of whole exome or targeted sequencing or intervals file.

wes.description: Enable when exome or panel data is provided.

ecr_registry.description: Amazon ECR registry for container images (e.g. '<account-id>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com')
